website_summaries.verdict: French company Focal's closed-back, over-ear headphone is designed for mobile use and delivers excellent sound for $250.
pros: The Focal Listen has a sturdy design and a comfortable and snug fit, and it sounds excellent for the price
Detachable cable includes an integrated one-button remote
The headphone folds up to fit in an included neoprene case
cons: Headphone is a tad heavy, may fit a little too snugly for some folks, and may not have enough bass for some listeners

website_summaries.verdict: The Focal Listen is a no-frills pair of over-the-ear headphones with an accurate, balanced sound signature sure to delight audiophiles.
pros: Balanced, accurate audio performance with rich bass and clear highs
cons: Not for those seeking booming bass response

customer_reviews.title: The Best $300 and under headphone
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I am extremely picky when it comes to headphones. I've tried a ton of offerings from Beyerdynamic, Audio Technica, Akg, you name it. These Focal headphones are the headphones I've been looking for for ages. The tonality and balance that these bring along with the soundstage they present is near perfect for my needs. They are intimate but expansive. Voices sound so natural and pleasant, the highs go high but aren't icy. Bass has bunch but is restrained and nicely placed in the mix. In short they sound great. They are supremely comfortable with very nice leather pads and comes with a nice case and a detachable cord. These headphones are a no beainer.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Great for at home or the office
customer_reviews.text: Brought these on my last trip. Pros: easy to drive with a minimal amp (Shanling M1). Love hearing the little nuances like the keyboard on the far left in Trans-Island Skyway. Very enjoyable, relatively flat, natural representation. Vocals and mids are a bit forward I would say but not exaggerated. Excellent isolation - no noise cancelling necessary in my opinion. Cons: Long wear is uncomfortable, however that's why they isolate so effectively. They are not slender. I'll consider keeping them at home, but no road trips.
customer_reviews.author: David Roeder

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice.
customer_reviews.text: We got these for our 16 year old for Christmas. They were the highest quality earphone for the best price. They are sturdy; an important feature for a teenager. They have good cord placement, good plug/play functionality, and have their own carrying case which is very handy for taking them on trips. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Heathcliff-Gonzalez Family

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great tone, better highs and mids than most headphones. Not as much bass, but the balance is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, good comfort
customer_reviews.text: After a disappointing experience with an other pair of headphones, I was hesitant to try another pair through Amazon, but decided to go for the Focals. The sound is very satisfying - strong bass, clear midrange and clean at low and high volume levels. The noise cancellation is solid too! The ear cups are deep enough to be comfortable and the headband is padded with an easily adjustable depth. Overall, an A+++.
customer_reviews.author: Rbuff

customer_reviews.title: Price went up $50 in a few hours WTF?
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my sister. She lives them. I thought I might get some for myself and put them in my wish list. They were $99 this afternoon and tonight they’re $149. Come on Jeff, a $50 increase on a $99 item? Tweaking prices to gouge the holiday shoppers?
customer_reviews.author: J. HALACY

customer_reviews.title: Wish the sound was better...
customer_reviews.text: May have been due to mishandling before delivery, but sound was not impressive and had significant crackling sounds on high pitch tones. Had to return. Amazing noise-cancelling headphones, wished the sound quality matched the build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice and STURDY , FABULOUS SOUND They are a LOT better than the BOSE they replaced -eaten by our new puppy--- GREAT QUALITY for the price. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: lilizzz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones! Highs are real crispy and the lows are defined and true.
customer_reviews.author: John Locke

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t like it
customer_reviews.text: My corsair headset had similar sound quality and much better comfort with a mic (even though it’s much cheaper!!). I bought this looking to experience sounds better but there really wasn’t much of a difference and it surely did not justify the high price. It also gets really uncomfortable fast. I thought my corsair headset was uncomfortable but this was on a different level. I think I’ll stick to gaming headsets.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Park

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: These really are fantastic. I did not expect this level of quality for only $169. Sound quality is superb, packaging is first class, build is fantastic. The only complaint I have is that they are a little bit of a tight fit. Hopefully with time they will stretch out a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Farzad Saif

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The sound from these headphones is not very great. At $50, you can get headphones with equal sound quality. Noise isolation is good but at the cost of high pressure on your ears and head. You feel like throw away these headphones from your head within 10 minutes of using them.
customer_reviews.author: Ramamohan Reddy

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my husband. He really likes them. Great sound and comfortable. Very pleased with this seller as well.
customer_reviews.author: LMA WI

customer_reviews.title: Best headphone I ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Really nice sounding headphones. Sound don't leak. Clear balance sound
customer_reviews.author: saad

customer_reviews.title: Very crisp and overall a nice headphone
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice headphone overall, it plays jazz, rocck, rap, classical and everything with nice clarity.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: These are Great! People cant hear what your listening to and ...
customer_reviews.text: These are Great! People cant hear what your listening to and they cut out noise from others around you so you can hear only what your listening to.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: one of the best mobility headphone
customer_reviews.text: one of the best mobility headphone, very Confi. if you add amp, you can get an amazing sound. again as mobile headphone its really cool, and if u download 320 quality song, u will get a better results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound excessively bright and were muddy in the lows.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like their sound signature. Sound excessively bright and were muddy in the lows.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: NOTE: The description says "Equipped with bluetooth wireless technology ...
customer_reviews.text: NOTE: The description says "Equipped with bluetooth wireless technology and compatible aptX." This is false, these are wired headphones and there is no BlueTooth. Don't buy these if you are looking for bluetooth wireless headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No included 1/4" adaptor? Can't be considered a serious headphone.
customer_reviews.text: The title says it all. Sure, definitely want a mobile solution, but no included way to listen to a serious headphone amp? Swing and a miss. Try the Beyerdynamic DT 880 or the Sennheiser HD 600 or 650. THOSE are decent headphones (with adapters included!!)
customer_reviews.author: C. Horton

customer_reviews.title: Great audio quality, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really great sound quality, amazing passive sound cancellation, and comfort(from materials), but its a bit tight. Seems to loosen after breaking them in. The bass is a bit weak (compared to my previous beats) but alright
customer_reviews.author: Steven Ewald

customer_reviews.title: This is the last headphones I will ever need
customer_reviews.text: This is the last headphones I will ever need or want to buy. Unless I decide to go big with Focal's other two new models. The extreme awesomeness of these cans were so much better than I was expecting, and I mean by a factor of say 3-5 times better. At the price point I would say they easily hang with the $1,000.00 models competitors are offering. Just pay the $250, you'll wonder where your music has been all your life as the sound wrap around the inside of your brain and make it seem you are in an entirely different dimension:)
customer_reviews.author: hawaii guy

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Ear pad fell off after a few months of use.
customer_reviews.author: jd

product_meta.title: Focal Listen Closed Back Headphones
product_meta.description: Premium Wired closed-back circum-aural portable headphones compatible with all smartphones. If you are looking for Bluetooth Wireless Headphones, look for the Focal Listen Wireless. These headphones are wired. Exclusive cone technology offering remarkable neutrality and sound quality. Light and comfortable with excellent noise isolation for an optimal experience in noisy environments. PREMIUM OVER-EAR HEADPHONES Listen embodies the best aspects of French acoustic quality. They combine all the advantages of premium mobile headphones: excellent insulation and optimal comfort. The Focal DNA marks their undeniable acoustic qualities. Designed in France by Focal's acoustics engineers, Listen combine all the advantages of premium portable headphones for hours of intense listening pleasure. Excellent noise isolation is guaranteed with the closed-back design and the large ear cushions, which preserve the headphones acoustic qualities, even in noisy environments. The heat-sensitive, very high-density memory foam ear-pieces offer maximum comfort for the listener. Finally, at the heart of Listen's acoustic qualities are the innovative 1¾ (40mm) drivers. Thus, Listen have an extremely dynamic sound, tight bass and remarkable tonal balance. These qualities are what make Listen the ideal travelling companion: listening pleasure, everywhere.
feature_bullets: Soft touch headband for optimum comfort and weight distribution
Chrome plated ear cup with manual brushing
Exclusive diaphragm technology offering amazing sound quality
Mobile, light, comfortable and high isolation headphones

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars74 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
